caption.p: Free radical scavenging activity of hydro-alcoholoc basil extracts, ( A)—OBAE (100 μg/mL) and OBHE (100 μg/mL) stock solution vs. ascorbic acid (AA—100 μg/mL); ( B)—hydro-alcoholic extracts from basil aerial—OBAE (100, 50 and 25 μg/mL) vs. AA (100 μg/mL); ( C)—hydro-alcoholic extracts from basil leaves—OBHE (100, 50 and 25 μg/mL) vs. AA (100 μg/mL).
